entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending before morning then flurries. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Blowing snow before morning. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
